channel.title: Help with "Wake the Snake"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Help with "Wake the Snake""

item.title: Re: Help with "Wake the Snake"
item.content:encoded: Erm, it only appears while you're bingo'ed, as in the time you're not allowed to collect/patrol/other village stuff after you're bingo'ed. So yeah if you want to do it right away just fail a bingo attempt or something.

item.title: Help with "Wake the Snake"
item.content:encoded: Hi everyone, I having a hard time trying to get this quest to appearâ€¦I've been bingoed multiple times over the past few days, but I've never been able to see the mission in my Quest List. Is there something I'm missing?
